title: 2 bedroom, Onsite playground, Courtyard and mountain views
posting_body: ['2 BD | 2 BA | 1056 SQFT', 'Your search for the perfect new apartment in North Las Vegas is over.', 'As one of the premier apartment communities, Sedona at Lone Mountain is an ideal place to call home.', 'Offering spacious one, two and three-bedroom apartments, our pet-friendly community has everything you need for a lavish and comfortable lifestyle.', 'Apartment Features:', 'Air conditioning with programmable thermostat-Separate dining area-Vaulted ceilings-Courtyard and mountain views-Oversized walk-in closets                                                                                                                                Select units                                                                                                                                Featured amenity-Ceiling fans in dining room and bedrooms-Fireplaces available-Private balcony or patio-In-home washer and dryer                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Featured amenity', 'Community Features:', 'Move-in with NO SECURITY DEPOSIT:', 'Only a small one-time payment-Courtesy patrol-Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply)-State-of-the-art fitness center-Direct access to Craig Ranch Park-Onsite playground-Landscaped courtyard with outdoor seating-Worry-free 24-hour onsite maintenance-Co-working lounge with complimentary Wi-Fi-Resident social lounge', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Equal Housing OpportunityPrices Change DailyFlexible Lease Terms']
